articles.title: Chris Evans' Performance in The Gray Man Is 'So Far Away' From Captain America, Say Russo Brothers - IGN - IGN
articles.description: It's a pretty big mental stretch to imagine the good-hearted, iconic hero Captain America as a total psychopath, but The Russo Brothers and actor Chris Evans are taking a crack at the notion in their upcoming film, The Gray Man.
